name: The Dark Path (V)
Lore: '''If once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny. Consume you it will, as it did Obi-Wan''s apprentice.''',
Text: 'Deploy on table. During battle, if you just drew a destiny, may lose that card to cancel and redraw that destiny. When you draw battle destiny, may lose X Force (limit 3) to make attrition against opponent +X.(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
